metadata.title: CVE-2024-37151 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine.Mishandling of multiple fragmented packets using the same IP ID value canlead to packet reassembly failure, which can lead to policy bypass. Upgradeto 7.0.6 or 6.0.20. When using af-packet, enable `defrag` to reduce thescope of the problem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-37151` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:7.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:7.0.6-1').
